block.p: SAGA COMMUNICATIONS INC., -- Grosse Pointe Farms, Mich., a television and radio broadcasting company, agreed to buy four radio stations in Ithaca, N.Y., from the closely held Elgae Broadcasting for $13.4 million.

PEPSI BOTTLING GROUP INC., -- Somers, N.Y., the largest bottler of Pepsi beverages in the world, agreed to buy the closely held Multisodas Inc., Chicoutimi, Quebec, a soft-drink bottler in eastern Canada. Terms were not disclosed.

CALIFORNIA PIZZA KITCHEN INC., -- Los Angeles, a restaurant chain, set an initial public offering at 5.3 million common shares in a range of $13 to $15 each, terms that could net about $68.3 million in proceeds.
RSA SECURITY INC., -- Bedford, Mass., a provider of security software, said it had doubled the number of authorized shares of its common stock to 300 million shares from 150 million.
